content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully placed on the map in these steps. Multiple recovery attempts to supply a Lab did not result in the creation or placement of a Lab, and no new production or assembling facilities were built (even though existing furnaces were referenced for smelting, none were placed by the agent).

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Mismatches – When calling get_entities, ensure the arguments exactly match the function’s signature. Avoid using unrecognized keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) and do not supply positional parameters if none are accepted.
• Iteration Over Non‐Iterable Results – When filtering the returned entities (such as labs), add a check to verify the result is iterable (or default to an empty list) to prevent “NoneType is not iterable” errors.
• Structure Placement Failures – Before attempting placement (for example, of a Lab), confirm that the required inventory item is available and that the target tile is unoccupied.
• Crafting Chain and Resource Shortages – Verify that every sub-ingredient needed for complex items (such as labs) is producible. Errors indicated shortages in intermediary items like iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables, and copper plates. Ensure that sufficient base materials are available and that proper production or smelting processes are in place before attempting crafting.
